Name: None
Text: You wake up… you had another one of those bad dreams.

Name: None
Text: You are stuck at your current job, no where to turn to.

Name: None
Text: Grocery store cashier clerk for the rest of your life, No family and living in your parents basement.

Name: None
Text: Time to wake up, head to your boring job and be poor.

Name: Customer1
Text: How’s your day going?

Name: Player
Text: Decent, yours?

Name: Customer1
Text: Ima ecstatic! I was helping my son sign up for his first race! The cost of entry is only $50! The 1st place winner gets $1,500!

Name: Player
Text: Wow, that’s cool! Quite a lot of money for a beginner’s race! Have a nice day sir.

Name: None
Text: You then remember your grandma; she was an amazing racer too. You know she has a car in the old garage out back. Maybe that’s your next employment?

Name: None
Text: The garage is dusty and old, reeks of the smell of mice. The car is worse...

Name: None
Text: You should fix it up.

Name: None
Text: You should fix it up.

Options.Text: Take it to the race anyway

Name: None
Text: You don’t have enough money

Name: None
Text: At the race....

Name: Henry
Text: Hey, the stadiums are back there.

Name: Player
Text: I’m here for the race.

Name: George
Text: Are you sure you know what you’re doing?

Name: Henry
Text: With the look of that car? Probably not!

Name: Player
Text: Is there anyone else I can talk to?

Name: Player
Text: Is there anyone else I can talk to?
